title: Update failed: "Unspecified error ocurred. Please check the logs for more information"
body:
Hi,

I am having this problem since the beggining of the year. I tried to install Lol, but this error shows up:
http://grabilla.com/0720d-a417c54d-a18b-4b96-9d6f-5f9e20b66aa9.png




I already did everything support asked and still can't fix the problem...
They said to fix with HRT, I did and didn't work.
They said to disable firewall while doing it and still didn't work.
I disabled Adobe, AVG and everything and nothing...
Also I followed the options that Wuks gave but... http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/qGY56UB4-comprehensive-troubleshooting-your-patching-issues 
Does anyone knows more solutions?

replies.body:
It appears the process is failing because your patcher is disconnecting from our patching servers. You should be able to resolve this by working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your local network settings are compatible with League.

Let me know if this resolved the issue.

So,I followed the guide but still no fix... 
I can t do the rooter one, because I don t know the password from the router.
Do you need any screenshots from somewhere to see what's  going on?

Screenshots may not be super useful, but system logs will be! You can grab some with our [**HRT Application**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367), then attach them to a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so one of our tech specialists can get back to you to further troubleshoot this. ^.^

Let me know if you have any questions.

I already did that and followed the options they gave... still no solution.
And when I open HRT to do a repatch the app closes for no reason.
I will have to format this computer or buy a new one.
Anyways, thank you for helping!
